sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../hoja-de-estilos/Card.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import * as images from '../Assets/climate/climate_images.js'; import DetailedCard from './DetailedCard.jsx'; function Card({ temp, max, min, name, img, onClose, handleOnDragEnd, humidity, lon, lat, date, description, wind, pressure, }) { const [detailed, setDetailed] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setDetailed(false); const handleShow = () => setDetailed(true); return (

{name}

{`Today - ${date}`}

{description .split(' ') .map((word) => word.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + word.substring(1)) .join(' ')}

{`${temp}°C`}

{`Min: ${min}°C`}

{`Max: ${max}°C`}

{`Humidity: ${humidity}%`}

{`Wind: ${wind}`}

{`Pressure: ${pressure}`}
); } export default Card;
